src:
Kalah Lawan Bournemouth, Solskjaer Indikasikan Salah Pilih Pemain
03 Nov 2019, 00:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan dibuat oleh Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. Manajer Manchester United itu mengakui bahwa ia membuat kesalahan saat melakukan pemilihan pemain sehingga mereka tumbang di markas Bournemouth.
Manchester United gagal melanjutkan streak tiga kemenangan beruntun mereka. Bertamu ke Vitality Stadium, Setan Merah harus kalah dengan skor tipis 1-0.
Pada laga itu, Solskjaer memutuskan untuk tidak terlalu banyak melakukan rotasi. Mayoritas line upnya sama dengan line up yang ia turunkan melawan Chelsea dan Norwich City pekan lalu.
Solskjaer mengakui bahwa ia salah memilih susunan pemainnya di pertandingan ini. "Mungkin saya seharusnya memainkan beberapa pemain lain di hari ini," ujar Solskjaer yang dikutip Manchester Evening News.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Defeated Against Bournemouth, Solskjaer Indicate Incorrect Players
Nov 3 2019, 00:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - An acknowledgment was made by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. The Manchester United manager admitted that he made a mistake when selecting players so they fell at the Bournemouth headquarters.
Manchester United failed to continue their three-game winning streak. A visit to the Vitality Stadium, the Red Devils have to lose by a thin score of 1-0.
In that match, Solskjaer decided not to rotate too much. The majority of his line-up is the same as the line-up he dropped against Chelsea and Norwich City last week.
Solskjaer admitted that he chose the wrong composition of his players in this match. "Maybe I should have played some other players today," Solskjaer was quoted as saying by the Manchester Evening News.

Read the trainer's full comment below.
